sentences.sContent: Ten footballer stood in a row on the sport ground.
sentences.sContent_eng: Ten footballer stood in a row on the sport ground.
sentences.sCn: 运动场上一字儿站着十名足球运动员。

sentences.sContent: The footballer pretended to run forward,then cut back and took the ball the other way.
sentences.sContent_eng: The footballer pretended to run forward,then cut back and took the ball the other way.
sentences.sCn: 这个足球运动员假装向前跑去，接着突然转变方向，把球带往另一边。

sentences.sContent: I had just started playing football, so I drew pictures of me as a professional footballer.
sentences.sContent_eng: I had just started playing football, so I drew pictures of me as a professional footballer.
sentences.sCn: 我那时刚刚开始踢球，所以我设想自己会成为一名职业足球运动员。

synos.tran: 足球运动员；橄榄球运动员

trans.tranCn: 足球运动员；橄榄球运动员
trans.tranOther: someone who plays football, especially a professional player
